examples.full_description: Pizza relationships can access the associated restaurant_pizzas
Pizza relationships can access the associated restaurants
RestaurantPizza relationships can access the associated restaurant
RestaurantPizza relationships can access the associated pizza

examples.description: must have a price between 1 and 30
examples.full_description: RestaurantPizza validations must have a price between 1 and 30
Restaurant relationships can access the associated restaurant_pizzas
Restaurant relationships can access the associated pizza

examples.description: returns an array of all pizzas
examples.full_description: Pizzas GET /pizzas returns an array of all pizzas
Pizzas GET /pizzas returns a status of 200 (OK)
RestaurantPizzas POST /restaurant_pizzas with valid data creates a new RestaurantPizza
RestaurantPizzas POST /restaurant_pizzas with valid data returns the associated Pizza data
RestaurantPizzas POST /restaurant_pizzas with valid data returns a status code of 201 (created)

examples.description: does not create a new RestaurantPizza
examples.full_description: RestaurantPizzas POST /restaurant_pizzas with invalid data does not create a new RestaurantPizza
RestaurantPizzas POST /restaurant_pizzas with invalid data returns the error messages

examples.description: returns a status code of 422 (Unprocessable Entity)
examples.full_description: RestaurantPizzas POST /restaurant_pizzas with invalid data returns a status code of 422 (Unprocessable Entity)

examples.description: returns an array of all restaurants
examples.full_description: Restaurants GET /restaurants returns an array of all restaurants

examples.description: does not return any nested pizzas
examples.full_description: Restaurants GET /restaurants does not return any nested pizzas
Restaurants GET /restaurants returns a status of 200 (OK)

examples.description: returns the matching restaurant with its associated pizzas
examples.full_description: Restaurants GET /restaurants/:id with a valid ID returns the matching restaurant with its associated pizzas
Restaurants GET /restaurants/:id with a valid ID returns a status of 200 (OK)
Restaurants GET /restaurants/:id with an invalid ID returns an error message

examples.description: returns the appropriate HTTP status code
examples.full_description: Restaurants GET /restaurants/:id with an invalid ID returns the appropriate HTTP status code
Restaurants DELETE /restaurants/:id with a valid ID deletes the Restaurant
Restaurants DELETE /restaurants/:id with a valid ID deletes the associated RestaurantPizzas
Restaurants DELETE /restaurants/:id with an invalid ID returns an error message

examples.description: returns the appropriate HTTP status code
examples.full_description: Restaurants DELETE /restaurants/:id with an invalid ID returns the appropriate HTTP status code

examples.description: does not define unnecessary pizza routes
examples.full_description: UnnecessaryRoutes does not define unnecessary pizza routes

examples.description: does not define unnecessary restaurant routes
examples.full_description: UnnecessaryRoutes does not define unnecessary restaurant routes

examples.description: does not define unnecessary restaurant_pizza routes
examples.full_description: UnnecessaryRoutes does not define unnecessary restaurant_pizza routes
